sections.title: The Historical Significance of the Fish
sections.thesis: How the fish motif accumulates meaning across time and becomes a carrier of psychic transformation.

sections.body: This chapter matters because it clarifies the lens you will use throughout Aion: symbolic tensions are not distractions, but the material of psychological transformation.

terms.definition: A historically layered motif in Aion that carries paradoxical meanings of totality, salvation, and shadow.
A universal structural pattern of the psyche expressed through symbols, myths, and recurring motifs.
A transpersonal layer of psyche expressed through archetypal patterns, symbols, and shared images.
